channel.title: Moss Giants - The Big Monsters of the Beyond
channel.description:
[center][font=Trebuchet Ms][size=5][u][b][shadow=green,left]Moss Giants - The big monsters of the beyond[/shadow][/b][/u][/size][/font]
[size=2][color=#61B329][i][b]By: [u]Arham 4[/u][/b][/i][/size]
[size=24pt][b][i]If you go to a forum called Zybez and saw this, Solo Lightning9 is me.[/i][/b][/size]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/252/proofuj.png/][IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/1139/proofuj.png[/img][/URL]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110116172536/runescape/images/thumb/6/61/Moss_giant.png/225px-Moss_giant.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=3]Table of Contents[/size][/b]
[ul][li][i]i - Revision history[/li] [li]1.0 - Introduction[/li] [li]2.0 - Requirements[/li] [li]3.0 - Getting Geared Up and Getting There![/li] [li]3.1 - Chaos Tunnels[/li] [li]4.0 - Killing the Moss Giants[/li] [li]5.0 - What Others Have Gotten[/li] [li]6.0 - Frequently Asked Questions[/li] [li]7.0 - Credits[/li][/ul]
[center] [s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][i]i - Revision history[/i][/size] » 31/1/2012 - Made this guide :). » 2/2/2012 - Made a new section
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Hello, and welcome to another one of my guides. Today I am making this guide about Moss Giants. Moss giants are huge monsters that give massive amounts of XP. It takes them an average of 2 hours for them to clean all your food. With each hour getting around 70k - 110k XP per a hour and 100 - 300k per a hour, moss giants are the way to go! By the time you are done reading this guide, you will see the way everyone is getting 99's now!
GL and enjoy! [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]2.0 - Requirements[/b][/size] In order to fight these large monsters, you will need specific requirements.
Stats: ========= 60+ Attack 60+ Strength 45+ Defence 55+ Magic (Optional for high alchemy) [P2P] 52 or 68 Summoning (Optional for Terrorbird or Bunyip)
With these stats you will have some good XP to get a few levels very fast!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]3.0 - Getting Geared Up and Getting There![/b][/size]
Now, this is the main section. Let's see the route you will be taking and gear you will be using!
(P2P) Gear: ==============
[Melee] [img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/3699/guide1n.png[/img] NOTE: This is the minimum required gear. You may switch for items that are better.
Helm: Helm of neitiznot > Berserker Helm > Warrior's Helm > Rune Full Helm
Amulet: Amulet of Fury > Amulet of Glory > Amulet of Strength
Cape: Mastery Cape > Obsidian Cape
Body: Bandos Chestplate > Void > Granite Platebody > Rune Platebody
Legs: Bandos Tassets > Void > Granite Platelegs > Rune Platelegs
Weapon: Dragon Scimitar/Abyssal Whip (Dragon Scimitar is better if you want to only train strength)
Shield: Dragon Defender > Rune Defender > Void Deflector > Granite Shield > Any other Defender
Boots: Dragon Boots > Rune Boots > Any other boots > Leather Boots
Gloves/Bracelet: Barrow Gloves > Dragon Gloves > Rune Gloves > Void Gloves Combat Bracelet > Any other RFD Gloves > Leather Gloves
Ring: Ring of wealth (4) > Berserker Ring(i) > Warrior Ring (i) > Berserker Ring > Warrior Ring > Explorer Ring(3/4 for tele) Ring of life > Nothing
===
[Range] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/8604/guide50003.png[/img]
Helm: Archer Helm > FOG (Fist of Guthix) Coif > Coif > Rune Full Helm
Amulet: Amulet of Fury > Amulet of Glory > Amulet of Power > Amulet of Accuracy
Cape: Ava's Accumalator > Fire Cape > Skill Cape > Legends Cape > Team Cape > Cape > Nothing
Ammo (If using shortbow or longbow): Steel Arrow > Iron Arrow > Bronze Arrow
Body: Black D'hide > Red D'hide > Blue D'hide > Green D'hide > Studded Body > Leather Body
Chaps: Black D'hide > Red D'hide > Blue D'hide > Green D'hide > Studded Chaps > Leather Chaps
Weapons/Bows: Steel Knives > Steel Darts > Iron Knives > Iron Darts > Bronze Knives > Bronze Darts > Magic Shortbow > Magic Longbow > Yes Shortbow > Yew Longbow > Any other Shortbow > Any other Longbow
Boots: Ranger Boots > Snakeskin Boots > Frog-leather Boots > Leather Boots > Nothing
Gloves: Black D'hide Vambraces > Red D'hide Vambraces > Blue D'hide Vambraces > Green D'hide Vambraces > Any other Vambraces > Leather Gloves > Nothing
Ring: Archer's Ring (i) > Ring of Wealth
===
[Mage] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/9979/guide50004.png[/img]
Helm: Ahrim's > Mystic Robes > Ghostly > FOG Hoods > Wizard Hat
Amulet: Amulet of Fury > Amulet of Glory > Amulet of Power
Cape: God Cape > Ghostly Cloak > God Cloak > Team Cape > Normal Cape > Nothing
Body: Ahrim's > Mystic Robes > Ghostly > FOG Robes > Wizard Robe
Legs: Ahrim's > Mystic Robes > Ghostly > FOG Robes > Blue Skirt
Weapon/Staff: Staff of Light > Ancient Staff > Masters Wand > Any other Wand > Staff of Fire/Air/Water/Earth > Magic Staff > Nothing
Shield: Mager's Book > Unholy Book > Book of Balance > Nothing
Boots: Infinity Boots > Mystic Boots > Lunar/Ghostly Boots > Leather Boots > Nothing
Gloves: Barrows Gloves > Dragon Gloves > Rune Gloves > Adamant Gloves > Lunar Gloves > Any other RFD Gloves > Ghostly Gloves > Leather Gloves > Nothing
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
(F2P) Gear: ============== [Melee] [img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/862/guide5000.png[/img]
Helm: Rune Full Helm > Adamant Full Helm
Amulet: Amulet of Power > Amulet of Strength
Cape: Team Cape > Normal Cape > Nothing
Body: Rune Platebody > Adamant Platebody
Legs: Rune Platelegs > Adamant Platelegs
Weapons: Rune Scimitar > Rune 2h Sword > Adamant Scimitar > Adamant 2h Sword > Any other Scimitar > Any other 2h Sword
Shield: Rune Kiteshield > Adamant Kiteshield [Nothing if using 2h Sword]
Boots: Leather Boots > Nothing
Gloves/Bracelets: Leather Gloves > Nothing
Ring: Nothing
===
[Range] [img]http://img848.imageshack.us/img848/6798/guide50001.png[/img]
Helm: FOG ( Fist of Guthix) Coif > Coif > Rune Full Helm
Amulet: Amulet of Power > Amulet of Accuracy
Cape: Team Cape > Cape > Nothing
Ammo (If using shortbow or longbow): Steel Arrow > Iron Arrow > Bronze Arrow
Body: Green D'hide > Studded Body > Leather Body
Chaps: Green D'hide > Studded Chaps > Leather Chaps
Weapons/Bows: Maple shortbow > Maple Longbow > Any other shortbow > Any other longbow
Boots: Leather Boots > Nothing
Gloves: Green D'hide Vambraces > Leather Gloves > Nothing
Ring: Nothing
===
[Mage] [img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/7622/guide50002.png[/img]
Helm: FOG Hoods > Wizard Hat
Amulet: Amulet of Power
Cape: Team Cape > Normal Cape > Nothing
Body: FOG Robes > Wizard Robe
Legs: FOG Robes > Blue Skirt
Weapon/Staff: Staff of Air > Staff of Fire > Magic Staff > Nothing
Boots: Leather Boots > Nothing
Gloves: Leather Gloves > Nothing
Inventory: =============
[P2P Melee] [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/333/guide2d.png[/img]
1x Dragon Dagger (Optional) 7x - 24x Monkfish 100x Bones to Peaches Tablets (Optional, but recommended) 1000x Fire Runes (Optional) 200x Nature Runes (Optional)
3.1 - Chaos Tunnels Upside: A lot of moss giants. Can use glory and just run back up. Not very crowded at peak time (around 0 - 2 people) Downside: In the wild (because then players can attack).
Route: =========
[img]http://img857.imageshack.us/img857/4408/guide3r.png[/img] Red = Running Route Yellow = Amulet of Glory route It is recommended to use the glory route if you have done heroes quest as you can recharge the glory. [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]4.0 - Killing the Moss Giants[/b][/size] When you get there, you'll see level 42 - 48 Moss Giants. If your a low level (50 - 70) then kill the 42's, if you are high leveled (70 - 138). Now time to know about these bones to peaches teletabs. If you are low on food then you can go the next room and kill those monsters. Then, you can pick up the bones and use the teletabs to make them peaches. If you don't care about the money making, then pick up the big bones and make them peaches. The part that makes you 100 - 300k p/hour is the big bones, must to get these. Speaking of drops, let e show you a list of what to pick up and what to not:
Always Common Uncommon Rare Very Rare
Item? Should I pick it up? P2P or F2P? Quantity?
Big Bones Yes F2P 1 Magic Staff No F2P 1 Mithril Spear No P2P 1 Mithril Sword No F2P 1 Steel Arrow No F2P 30 Iron Arrow No F2P 15 Adamant Sword No F2P 1 Black Full Helm No F2P 1 Black SQ Shield No F2P 1 Steel Helm No F2P 1 Steel Kiteshield No F2P 1 Steel Full Helm No F2P 1 Steel Platebody No F2P 1 Air Rune Yes F2P 18 Cosmic Rune Yes F2P 3 Earth Rune Yes F2P 27 Nature Rune Yes F2P 6 Law Rune Yes F2P 3 - 6 Blood Rune Yes P2P 1 Chaos Rune Yes F2P 7 Death Rune Sure F2P 1 - 3 Soul Rune Yes P2P 20
[u][b]To be completed...[/b][/u]
All the yes are the ones that will make you money.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]5.0 - What Other People Have Got[/b][/size] Coming Soon...
Please post some images of your exp you gained (from your exp timer) and your loot (from the price checker).
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]6.0 - Frequently Asked Questions[/b][/size]
Q: How are moss giants so massive exp?
» A: They are so low levelled, but they have alot of HP which makes them convenient. They also dont have that high of a max hit, so you can camp there for a while.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]7.0 - Credits[/b][/size] [b]Jagex:[/b] For making such an amazing game! [b]Wiki:[/b] For the intro picture. [b]YOU!:[/b] For reading my guide ;-) .

did moss giants for two hours, didnt get one good seed/rune drop. made a bit off big bones tho. Once (if) jagex gets rid of the color picker bots or however the bots are back, green dragons is stil my preffered way of mm.

Atleast a pic :D?

@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:17, topic:431482”]I like how you have -8 reputation on zybez.

That, and there is NO way that Moss Giants can get you 120k XP an hour. Vyrelords are one of the only methods to get that much XP using melee because you hit 500+ very frequently, unlike here where you probably aren’t even likely to hit above 250 very often.[/quote]

Forgot to change that in my original post, will change it later (tommorow, need to go to sleep in 3 mins)…

Rodgerwilco:

Since when did moss giants require a boss tutorial?

That’s a complement, right?

item.title: Moss Giants - The Big Monsters of the Beyond
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I like how you have -8 reputation on zybez.

That, and there is NO way that Moss Giants can get you 120k XP an hour. Vyrelords are one of the only methods to get that much XP using melee because you hit 500+ very frequently, unlike here where you probably aren’t even likely to hit above 250 very often.

Read full topic
